com.redhat.rhn.frontend.context

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.context.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Context class used to get information about a given Thread's decorations starting with Locale. This class allows global static access to the current running Thread's Context object. If one isn't found an Exception is thrown.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void freeCurrentContext()
      Frees the Context object assigned to the executing thread
      java.lang.String getActiveLocaleLabel()
      The localized display "label" for the currently active locale

      Get the current context for the current running Thread.

      Returns the original locale for a given request This _might not_ be the same locale which is ultimately used for translating application text
